pkgmetadata.longdescription: Construction of Genetic Maps in Experimental Crosses // Analysis of molecular marker data from model and non-model systems. For the later, it allows statistical analysis by simultaneously estimating linkage and linkage phases (genetic map construction) according to Wu and colleagues (2002) doi:10.1006/tpbi.2002.1577. All analysis are based on multi- point approaches using hidden Markov models.
